name: Asociácia priemyslu, poľnohospodárstva a služieb
goal: Strong Slovak group of companies, with core business in the production of biofuels, ethanol, spirits, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, agricultural and food products. The group is also expanding into transportation (trains and trucks), logistic, billing and IT.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
